list.name: POWER-THROW
list.description: Carl throws his Pickaxe with x% more speed, allowing it to travel and return faster.
list.descriptionHtml: Carl throws his Pickaxe with x% more speed, allowing it to travel and return faster.

list.name: PROTECTIVE-PIROUETTE
list.description: During Carl's Super, all damage he receives is reduced by x%.
list.descriptionHtml: During Carl's Super, all damage he receives is reduced by x%.
